name: Spore Wars
description:
STORY

Some dumb witch turned you into a mushroom!

Now the mushroom leaders have forced you to be a common foot soldier in the Spore Wars. Run, jump, and fight your way through the green mushroom menace in this action platformer.

CONTROLS
  • A - Move Left
  • D - Move Right
  • W - Jump
  • Mouse - Look Around
  • Left Click - Fire Weapon
  • E - Interact/Pick Up Gun
  • F - Drop Gun
  • P - Pause
MAKING OF

Want to know how this game was assembled? Watch the linked video!

Performance Problems?

A native build may run better. If you are on windows you can download a copy from the link below.
